alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 5:29AM AKST until December 22 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Bristol Bay. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A warm front is forecast to advance toward Bristol Bay Tuesday evening. Precipitation preceding the front is expected to fall initially as snow. However, warming temperatures with the front`s passage will support a transition from snow to a mix of freezing rain and sleet along the coast Tuesday night and across interior Bristol Bay Tuesday morning. Mixed precipitation will transition to rain along the coast Wednesday morning. Minor snow accumulations of up to two inches with locally higher amounts up to 4 inches can be anticipated with up to a tenth of an inch of ice through Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
